Package hippodrome

Class Paddock

  • java.lang.Object
    • hippodrome.Paddock

  • public class Paddock
extends java.lang.Object
    Place where the horses are paradded before the Spectators. As the pairs Horse/Jockey comes here, it means that each and everyone of them is getting prepared to be on the next race.
    Since:
    0.1
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Hugo Fragata, Rui Lopes

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private int currentNumberOfHorses
      Current number of HorseJockey present in the Paddock.
      private int currentNumberOfSpectators
      Current number of Spectators present in the Paddock.

      Condition variable for noticing when the last pair Horse/Jockey have (or have not) proceeded to the start line.
      private boolean lastSpectatorHasNotArrivedOnPaddock
      Condition variable for noticing when the last Spectator has (or has not) arrived to the Paddock.
      private int numberOfHorses
      Total number of HorseJockey competing.
      private int numberOfSpectators
      Total number of Spectator attending the events.

      Creates a Paddock.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean goCheckHorses​()
      Signal given by the Broker in order to the Spectators go check the pairs Horse/Jockey and verify if there are more to come.
      void goCheckHorses​(boolean isTheLastSpectator)
      Changes the Spectator's state to Appraising the Horses (ATH) and waits till the last proceedToStartLine().
      void proceedToPaddock​(int raceNumber)
      Changes the state of the pair Horse/Jockey to At the Paddock (ATP) and waits for the last Spectator to arrive on Paddock on the goCheckHorses(boolean) method.

    • Field Detail

      • currentNumberOfHorses

        private int currentNumberOfHorses
        Current number of HorseJockey present in the Paddock.

      • currentNumberOfSpectators

        private int currentNumberOfSpectators
        Current number of Spectators present in the Paddock.

      • numberOfHorses

        private int numberOfHorses
        Total number of HorseJockey competing.

      • numberOfSpectators

        private int numberOfSpectators
        Total number of Spectator attending the events.

      • lastHorseDidNotProceedToStartLine

        private boolean lastHorseDidNotProceedToStartLine
        Condition variable for noticing when the last pair Horse/Jockey have (or have not) proceeded to the start line.
        This is a condition variable of the goCheckHorses(boolean) method and it is reset on the proceedToPaddock(int) method.

      • lastSpectatorHasNotArrivedOnPaddock

        private boolean lastSpectatorHasNotArrivedOnPaddock
        Condition variable for noticing when the last Spectator has (or has not) arrived to the Paddock.
        This is a condition variable of the proceedToPaddock(int) method and it is reset on the goCheckHorses(boolean) method.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Paddock

        public Paddock​(int numberOfSpectators,
               int numberOfHorses)
        Creates a Paddock.
        This constructor creates a Paddock giving a number of pairs Horse/Jockey and a number of Spectators. Plus, an instance of the repository is also given in order to report status changes on the course of its actions.
        Parameters:
        numberOfSpectators - The number of Spectators which will be attending the event.
        numberOfHorses - The number of pairs Horse/Jockey which will be competing.

    • Method Detail

      • proceedToPaddock

        public void proceedToPaddock​(int raceNumber)
                      throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Changes the state of the pair Horse/Jockey to At the Paddock (ATP) and waits for the last Spectator to arrive on Paddock on the goCheckHorses(boolean) method.
        This method also resets the condition variable of the goCheckHorses(boolean) method.
        Parameters:
        raceNumber - number identification of the race which is about to begin.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if the wait() is interrupted.

      • goCheckHorses

        public void goCheckHorses​(boolean isTheLastSpectator)
                   throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Changes the Spectator's state to Appraising the Horses (ATH) and waits till the last proceedToStartLine(). It also notifies proceedToPaddock(int) when the last Spectator is about to appraise the horse - you fool.
        Parameters:
        isTheLastSpectator - identification if the last Spectator has reached the premises - if true; otherwise false.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if the wait() is interrupted.

      • proceedToStartLine

        public void proceedToStartLine​()
        Signal that the race is about to start, by a HorseJockey.
        Note that this method changes the value of the condition variable to the goCheckHorses(boolean) wait condition, notifying its changes.

      • goCheckHorses

        public boolean goCheckHorses​()
        Signal given by the Broker in order to the Spectators go check the pairs Horse/Jockey and verify if there are more to come. This must be done in order to establish a more accurate bet on the probable winner.
        Returns:
        true if the last Spectator has moved to the Paddock; otherwise false.
